real-estate.outlook: Strong growth driven by housing crisis and institutional investment in Build-to-Rent. Office market recovering with flight to quality. Mixed-use regeneration schemes active around transport hubs.

energy.outlook: Major grid reinforcement needed to support electrification and data centre growth. London Power Tunnels 2 progressing. Offshore wind connections landing in South East.

defence.outlook: Estate optimisation continuing with investment in key strategic sites. RAF Northolt modernisation, Aldershot regeneration. Focus on sustainability and operational efficiency.

data-centres.outlook: Explosive growth with London as Europe's largest market. Slough corridor expansion continuing. New hyperscale developments in West London and Thames Valley. Power availability becoming critical constraint.

infrastructure.outlook: Significant flood defence investment in Thames Estuary. School rebuilding programme active. NHS estate modernisation. Waste infrastructure for circular economy.
